name: Sportsman Airpark, Inc.
about: Sportsman Airpark, Inc., located in Newberg, Oregon, has been a cornerstone of general aviation since 1946. As a public use airport, it serves as a vital gateway for regional and national air transportation. The flying school at Sportsman Airpark offers a comprehensive range of flight instruction, including Private Pilot Certificates, Commercial Pilot Certificates, Instrument Ratings, and Flight Instructor training. With a diverse fleet of aircraft, students can pursue various ratings and certifications. Additional ground school and seminars are also available to support thorough aviation education. Dedicated to fostering a safe and supportive learning environment, Sportsman Airpark is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals. Whether you are a novice or an experienced aviator, Sportsman Airpark provides the resources and expertise to help you soar to new heights.
